actionTemplate.title: Qing Petal Lip A (Gradient Petal)
steps: Neutralize the lips and keep the outer edge lighter
Tap lipstick on the inner lip area, leaving a petal-like border
Blend outward with a cotton swab for a deep-to-light gradient
Refine the edge and blot to set

rationaleTemplate: An inner gradient looks soft, youthful, and romantic.
A lighter border makes the lip shape feel airy like petals.
